alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:57AM MST until January 18 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft
